title: Next Korean Wave: Post-Pregnancy Care Centers? - WSJ
text:

Dow Jones Reprints at 1-800-843-0008 or visit www.djreprints.com. http://blogs.wsj.com/korearealtime/2013/04/19/next-korean-wave-post-pregnancy-care-centers/ By Jeyup S Kwaak April 18, 2013 10:35 pm ET When Lee Yu-seon was pregnant with her first child last year, she made it her priority to book a place to stay -- after delivery. Instead of returning home from the hospital, the Seoul-based dentist set her mind on a postpartum care center in the glitzy Gangnam district, a trend among South Korea's affluent.
